affect ( "talker2", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	set ( "SET_RELEASE_ONCONTACT", "ON" );

	task ( "patrol2" )
	{
		set ( "SET_GOAL", "Guard" );
		set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_NAVGOAL", "bridge_patrol_a" );
		set ( "SET_NAVGOAL2", "bridge_patrol_b" );
	}

	dowait ( "patrol2" );
}
